content: 12 with bright orange 6 single_crochet in each st 7 *3 single_crochet increase* 3 times 15 8 single_crochet in each st 9 *4 single_crochet increase* 3 times 18 with bright yellow 10 single_crochet in each st 11 *5 single_crochet increase*3 times 21 12 single_crochet in each st 13 *6sc increase* 3 times 24 14 single_crochet in each st add 15mm eye between r8 & r9 15 *2 single_crochet decrease* 6 times 18 16 *single_crochet decrease* 6 times 12 stuff with fiber fill 17 *decrease* 6 times 6 fasten_off use tail to cinch hole closed with black embroider around the top of the eye and a smile with fangs below it assembly sew candy corn to on top of ring at the bottom designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo enjoy your new halloween wreath if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
